channel.title: cube on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cube on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Challenging cube puzzle
item.description: 17:18 Tuesday 29 September 2015 JST At the toy store tonight, they showed me a new puzzle. An all white Rubik’s cube. All white so it’s already solved right? ブッブー. It’s shaped like an egg, so only with the variance in the faces’ various edges’ elevations can the solution be found!
